website_summaries.verdict: LIke other Panasonic models before it, the Lumix GX85/GX80 packs a lot for its price, including great photos, 4K video and speed.
pros: It delivers excellent photo and video for a Micro Four Thirds camera, especially at its price, plus a great feature set and fast performance
cons: The continuous autofocus occasionally fails to lock at all in burst mode, and the battery life is poor

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great
customer_reviews.text: [WHAT'S NOT TO LIKE] -Screen is not fully articulated -viewfinder is JUST OK, controls are good, but not at a profesional level (feel small, cheap). Compared to better cameras, the dials are small, cheap and not in the best position. Olympus m5 markii has better controls [WHAT'S TO LIKE] small kit lens is amazing timer is very ez to set up Good Image Stabilization good lens combo, great lens selection it has hot shoe excellent price
customer_reviews.author: Ramon E. Salazar

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera at a good price point
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a professional photographer, just wanted to get that out there. This camera is my first "real" camera and I love the thing. Excellent camera to get into photography with especially considering price. Edit: have had this camera for a while now and still love it. It has video capability but I don't see it as a video camera, definitely not a vloger cam (no mic input jack) but none of that matters for me. I just wanted it to learn photography and it's a whole bunch of fun and that's kinda the point. Also, m43 lenses are cheaper than bigger frame cameras which is a big plus for me ( depending on what lens and blah blah blah)
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: WOW! Quality COMPACTED for an affordable price!
customer_reviews.text: I am a videographer/photographer transitioning resentfully into the mirrorless world- and it feels seamless! The camera body is very compact, less than half the weight of my Mark II. The kit lens is gorgeous and the added telephoto lens is a good start for photography. I am most impressed by the in-body stabilization. I have been cursed with shaky hands all my life and this aids GREATLY with my micro jitters. The LCD screen is very receptive to touch. 4K photos look GORGEOUS! I shoot 24 mp otherwise and was still blown away by the quality of the 16 MP. Anyone looking to jump into the mirrorless world or just looking for a starter camera, GET THE GX85! 10/10!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Ahlenius

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera - I normally use a GH4 and ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera - I normally use a GH4 and purchased this as my second camera. Love the stabilization. Very little problems thus far. Would like to batteries to last longer but the stabilization makes up for everything. Shooting with 1.5 Rokinon Cine Lenses plus a generic speedbooster and this camera does better in low light than the GH4. Audio input would be nice but I almost always record externally regardless. All in all a great product
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Trent Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Great affordable first or second camera
customer_reviews.text: Very portable, I actually kept it in a lens pouch with the kit lens in my belt during a trip when I didn't feel like hauling the camera bag around. Not a DSLR but far better than a phone. Kit lens is surprisingly very good and I noticed I hardly changed lenses to my faster prime in low light if things are not moving. Didn't do much video but just played with it to test. Image stabilization is great and you could get away with a lot with hand held shooting. Great camera for the price and so portable I will even carry it as a second camera when I do use my DSLR. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect camera for what I do
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera mainly to use for filming indoor under low light. I pair it with a prime lens with low F-stop. The 4K video is perfect. I only wish though the rate is 60fps on 4K. I also tested shooting photos under low light and like it very much. This is my second 4K lumix. I also owned G7.
customer_reviews.author: TikoyBilog46

customer_reviews.title: Panasonic LUMIX GX85 4K Digital Camera
customer_reviews.text: This professional class DLSR is awesome. It has computers within for auto adjustments, stabilizing video, and producing high quality 4K photos and videos. Since it is lens swap capable, it comes with 12-32mm and 45-150mm Lens Bundle. Takes very clear photos. It has all other smart cameras features as well. The only thing wrong it has substandard audio quality during recording.
customer_reviews.author: Pastor Walt Guimbellot

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, but Amazon Warehouse Deal versions have issues
customer_reviews.text: Great camera, but I went through two via Amazon Warehouse Deals. The first was flakey (locking up while shooting) and had a spot on the lower right of the sensor. The second has a similar same spot---trust me, I tried different lenses and subjects on both bodies. However, it was a good price and the spot only becomes an issue when shooting above f/18, which is very rare for me, so I decided to make do.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph M. Reagle Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Nice balance of features for travel
customer_reviews.text: I'm a fan of panasonic "Lumix" series cameras. This one is no exception. The menu systems if easy to master. Options in "scene" mode are useful when travelling and popping off pictures. The camera is larger than a regular point and shoot and smaller than a DSLR. I use it with a 16-30mm lens on trips and drop it into my vest or cargo pants pocket. It has good balance and is a pleasure to use with the range finder. I would highly recommend for travel if you don't mind the extra size,
customer_reviews.author: ZenReader

customer_reviews.title: Good balance between price, image quality, size, weight and functions.
customer_reviews.text: Never expect it to be as good as a full frame camera. But it is smaller and lighter! Especially the weight of lenses are significant lighter! Comparing with Panasonic LX10 LX100 and Sony RX100 series, it has the capability of changing lenses. For my need, it is the best. The only pity is that the short battery life, which is a common problem for any small size mirror less digital camera.
customer_reviews.author: WX

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera
customer_reviews.text: It's light, fast, and takes great photos. Also, I have a Canon HD camcorder, and i feel like the video shot on my Lumix GX85 definitely surpasses it. I find that it is all I need now and couldn't be more pleased. In the past I have used several Canon DSLR's and a few Nikon Superzooms. This is the best camera i have used in literally every category (other than lens selection).
customer_reviews.author: Andrew James Shields

customer_reviews.title: Super value.
customer_reviews.text: I found the GX85 super capable in all areas and came back including from a game shoot with the 100-400 with higher hitrate than my Nikon pro equipment (except high speed autofocus). All pro glass are pro indeed and the little kit lens 12-32 better that expected but still visibly less sharp in comparison. Big on fun for social events with both internal and smaller external flashes. Highly recommended. Not sure about the desert and ice yet.
customer_reviews.author: Johan Geyer

customer_reviews.title: rip-off
customer_reviews.text: I returned this item when I received the camera without a battery charger or memory card. You would think for the price asked, they would include those 2 items. The quality of the camera looked questionable. Not worth the time or money.
customer_reviews.author: joynhim

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera and 2 lens kit.
customer_reviews.text: By no means am I anything more than a hobbyist photographer but I will say that this camera is a pleasure as it is easy to get good results. I looked at many cameras and believe this kit was a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Ken G.

customer_reviews.title: I love this camera.
customer_reviews.text: I got this camera to use as my main camera for live streaming. I use an Elgato 4K Camlink and a dummy battery to use it as my webcam. The quality looks great and I love the size of the camera. I also take it with me to record on the go and again, the size is perfect for this. I got it on sale and I can say I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Brax

customer_reviews.title: A well made camera with great features.
customer_reviews.text: The image stabilization works very well and the 4/3 sensor provides amazingly clear pictures even in low light
customer_reviews.author: NorthWind

customer_reviews.title: The best mirrorless option
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this camera is amazing: it's lightweight, takes amazing photos, shoots in 4k and includes an amazing array of shooting modes. I did a ton of research into mirrorless cameras before I bought this, and I could not have been happier with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Not Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Lightweight Impressive array of lens options and built-in features. (Relatively) inexpensive high end digital camera system. Cons: Other than easy connectivity. Proprietary USB cable required to connect to PC. (circa 2002 paradigm...) Likewise, WiFi connectivity is "difficult".
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: HOLY WOW!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this camera for three days now and this camera is insane, boy does it pack a punch in a small lil camera. I want the G85 now too. I cannot believe how well this camera handles, I would give it ten stars if I could. I am able to get shots very close to how they look with my fly cam. I think I will be using this camera a lot more then my AF-100's. Excellent job Panasonic.
customer_reviews.author: Damien Day

customer_reviews.title: Great camera but no mic jack.
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited when I got this camera, but then disappointed it doesn't have a mic jack. It takes great photos and video and is easy to use but not having a mic jack is terrible. I returned it and bought a Canon M50.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. It's feature rich and the resolution and 4K video stabilization blows away the competition.
customer_reviews.author: J. Kestel

customer_reviews.title: Software is very clunky, dated and proprietary.
customer_reviews.text: Seems impossible to connect to my Mac. If I'm missng something feel free to let me know. The instructions for connecting it on the Panasonic site include powering off my Mac. Seems very dumb.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C

customer_reviews.title: Love to travel with my GX85
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for traveling to Argentina, and really liked the feel and the features. Zoom for capturing photos was enjoyable, and video filming was nice. I would love to have more grip, but it is ok.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime E. Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for video
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera to record 1080p videos 60 to 90 minutes in length, which it does very capably. Video quality is really good. It should record 4k videos as well but I haven't tried this as it will take up more space.
customer_reviews.author: Huw

customer_reviews.title: Love This Camera
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this camera it's exactly what I was looking for in a mirrorless DSLR camera. It takes wonderful pictures and very easy to use in multiple settings. The autofocus can be an issue at times but it's an easy workaround, with a few settings. I would recommend this camera for anyone that's a beginner to intermediate photographer and wants to shoot high-quality video as well.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory E Adams

customer_reviews.title: Great potential
customer_reviews.text: What a camera. Excellent build quality for the price point. The image stabilization is excellent. Lot of settings to the point where I miss my Nikon FE. Simplicity would help.
customer_reviews.author: matjr

customer_reviews.title: Much better than I expected. I love micro 4/3
customer_reviews.text: Coming from a canon 7d I wasn’t expecting too much but this camera is amazing. I love everything about it and honestly don’t think I’d change anything about it.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Crownover

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Camera
customer_reviews.text: I've had numerous dslr and mirrorless cameras, but this one beats them all. The picture quality is amazing even in auto mode and the camera is very intuitive and simple to use.
customer_reviews.author: Roy Hoskins

customer_reviews.title: Some object is moving inside Camera Body
customer_reviews.text: I have recently purchased this camera, when I open the camera and move little bit , there is some object which moves inside camera body. I am not sure what is that part but if move camera little also I can feel an object is not completely tied up inside and instable. I need to help on this.
customer_reviews.author: Kalyan

customer_reviews.title: Incredible.
customer_reviews.text: It is amazing how much the micro 2/3 cameras have improved. Honestly, I retired my big Nikons because this is such a good camera. Love everything about it.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Product Got Stolen
customer_reviews.text: This was original a gift for my girlfriend to help her take better photos for her blog. Unfortunately the camera got stolen before we could ever test it out. But probably a really good camera! And when I get the money I will buy this same exact model and deal. Worth the buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing camera for beginning photographers with lots of Youtube videos for guidance on how to maximize the features. Great size for travel too.
customer_reviews.author: eks

customer_reviews.title: This is a perfect hip hop/rap  Music Video camera
customer_reviews.text: I strictly make hip hop rap music videos. This project is amazing . It is my first camera but I have already got really tuned in with it . Only thing I’m not crazy is if you are looking to capture good audio then this camera might not be for you. If your making music videos this camera is perfect for that. That’s what I use it for and so far it has given me the best cinematic clips . Hands down happy with this camera will upgrade to g85 very soon
customer_reviews.author: PowersOrtiz

customer_reviews.title: Great pictures from a small
customer_reviews.text: Takes great pictures and the kit lenses are really better than I expected kit lenses to be. The only real complaint I have is the battery life is not that great. Buying an extra battery or two would be a good idea.
customer_reviews.author: Mike S.

customer_reviews.title: Impressive for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! For the price this is an amazing camera! The video is amazing!! My son has shot several weddings with it. Only draw back is low light conditions but we bought a light to help with that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Compact and awesome
customer_reviews.text: My wife is a natural at taking pictures (mostly landscape) and she loves her new GX-85. The Nikon is too big to hike with for her and this camera just fits the bill. Nicely done Panasonic!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Baker

customer_reviews.title: fairly complicated
customer_reviews.text: I have not learned a lot about it......quite complex, and had some difficulty finding a manual....wish they had included a paper one....the photos are excellent
customer_reviews.author: JF

customer_reviews.title: versatility
customer_reviews.text: Have a load of old lenses wanted to mess with so went with the pana over the sony a600 after lots of research and not disappointed. Kit lenses are far better than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Karl Andersen

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Let me tell you guys that I absolutely love this camera!!!!! I’m learning how to use it still so far I’ve loved it a lot. Follow me on ig @valerin.co I posted lots of pictures I took with this camera
customer_reviews.author: valerin

customer_reviews.title: Two lenses and a body for the price of some body-only kits
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a low-cost older model as a secondary camera but found this kit on a special price. Glad for the upgrade and would do it again. Two lenses makes this kit quite effective.
customer_reviews.author: E. Halley

customer_reviews.title: Suggest a Sony with a built in adjustable lens instead.
customer_reviews.text: A good camera that is too time consuming to use; the lenses are only good for picture quality and not great.
customer_reviews.author: Mel S. Randall

customer_reviews.title: Nice Hardware, impossible software.
customer_reviews.text: It seems like pretty good Hardware. The Optics seem to be pretty good too. It's video quality is exceptional. Transferring the images should not be so impossible however.
customer_reviews.author: Scooter-Trash

customer_reviews.title: Just bought this as a video camera and love it, started using this instead of my Nikon ...
customer_reviews.text: Just bought this as a video camera and love it, started using this instead of my Nikon Full Frame. Much lighter, I just wished it had a selfie screen.
customer_reviews.author: Blinkit Photography

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: This is my first digital camera so bare with me. I bought this for a trip to Colorado with my girlfriend and I wanted something more than just my Note 9. I know my phone has a great camera but I wanted something more. And for $500 this camera is amazing! It has introduced me to the world of cameras. The only bad thing about the camera is the fact that you will be spending more money on your new hobby.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The in camera Raw touch up is a nice feature..
customer_reviews.text: This lumix GX85 put my Sony A6000 to shame for all the packed features that comes with the camera at a lower price. I only have it for a week and are already seeing a big difference. Goes really well with my Sigma Len. Five Stars!!!
customer_reviews.author: Phan Thiet Guy OKC

customer_reviews.title: Great All Rounder
customer_reviews.text: Stunning images , very handy , well built , easy to use , extremely fast focus , wonderful image stabilization and most of all this camera is made for all purpose shooting conditions. Very highly recommended camera .
customer_reviews.author: LEO J FERNANDO

customer_reviews.title: Picture quality
customer_reviews.text: Not too bad for a semi point and shoot but still didn't measure up to my pro standards that I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice camera. I sold mine and got a second ...
customer_reviews.text: This camera gives the same image quality as the G85. It's a nice camera. I sold mine and got a second G85 because I just liked the ergonomics of the G85 more. However the GX85 is a very nice camera.
customer_reviews.author: purplegang

customer_reviews.title: this is my travel camera and has been to all climates and terrain
customer_reviews.text: strong and sturdy, cant say enough great things about the picture quality. great for light traveling around the world
customer_reviews.author: F. Cole

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camera!
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera so much. I got so many good feedback from the quality of photos i shot for people.! great buy!!!! now to get bags and stuff
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne

customer_reviews.title: Super Heroes Like This Camera
customer_reviews.text: Got this camera for my Super Hero group. Pictures came out get. Has so many features I haven't even touched yet. Would definitely recommend this camera. Strap that comes with it is not great but can easily find another one.
customer_reviews.author: D. Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Best camera for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Greatest camera for money great 4K features and easy to handle
customer_reviews.author: Shelbystroodle

customer_reviews.title: I can't download photos
customer_reviews.text: All my photos are stuck on my camera. I've spent nearly a full day (8 hours) trying to figure out how to download photos. I've owned many cameras in the past, all were very straight forward, got the basics right. This one has a huge problem - can't download to Mac the photos you've taken. Extremely frustrating
customer_reviews.author: Martin Duggan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product
customer_reviews.text: This product is absolutely amazing. It has the best picture quality for the price. The image stabilization feature on it is top tier as well. The auto focus is also better than previous more expensive cameras that I have owned.
customer_reviews.author: Bryant Goldstein

customer_reviews.title: 4k/30 with IBIS for cheap.
customer_reviews.text: Great b-cam for the GH5. Hack cinelike D into it and it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: as beautiful as film cameras
customer_reviews.text: as someone who’s utilized film cameras i found this digital camera to come right close with quality of photo. the interface and menu is a little intense to understand, which i’m still slowly doing - but if you’ve got time on your hands and sleepy cats laying around you’ll learn pretty quick.
customer_reviews.author: noel sma

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: This is a very high tech, high quality camera. Many amazing features. One of my favorites being the touch screen. This camera will be good for serious photographers. Any skill level could adapt to this camera. I cannot wait to start using it for photo shoots and videos!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Wright

customer_reviews.title: Fun camera - very capable of amazing images
customer_reviews.text: Fun camera - currently paired with the Leica 15mm 1.7 - not missing my full frame camera at all.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Great 4K video in a small package.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera for its small profile, and 4K video. I work in the EDM industry, and needed something that could shoot 4K in low light. The functionality of the software and ergonomically designed body both impressed me. The low light performance is great, and considering the price difference to the Sony A6300, it is a much better bang for your buck dispite the auto focus being a bit too slow.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for its price
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice camera. Very good for street photography and travel videos.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Perfect balance of value and quality
customer_reviews.text: The camera is great for the value and size in this category. I’m not sure you would need to spend more. I would buy the 42.5mm 1.7 lens as well. I think the included lenses are too slow.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Mirrorless Camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: Best damn camera I’ve had. Takes awhile to figure it out but you do in time and practice. Very good for the price (especially since I’m doing monthly payments on it)
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Morales

customer_reviews.title: Someone Forgot Their SD Card With Tons Of Photos On It...
customer_reviews.text: I'd love to give the SD card back to the owner who accidentally left their SD card inside the camera. It has well over 3,000 photos spanning over 6 years. If you sold your camera to Amazon for them to resell, this could be your SD card. I feel kind of bad for that person. So many memories you could have lost (especially if you didn't back it up). It's from an all black Panasonic Lumix GX85 camera.
customer_reviews.author: TruthBTold

customer_reviews.title: A very versatile camera
customer_reviews.text: Other than a little higher resolution of the newer model it has everything else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Camera. Mirrorless is the future. You gain at at leas 1/2 stop. Really satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: RaffromNJ

customer_reviews.title: Bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Im a newbie in photography so not much to say. But this is a great value for money.
customer_reviews.author: wel

customer_reviews.title: Sweet camera
customer_reviews.text: A wonderful mirrorless for the price. Both 4k pictures and video.
customer_reviews.author: anthony g.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This camera exceeded all my expectations great buy and great product
customer_reviews.author: Will Muhammad

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic secondary camera for my kit
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic body. It is a great secondary camera to my kit.
customer_reviews.author: Vinni Hoke

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful compact little camera
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful compact little camera. Stunning shots. Love it for video. Slowing down 60fps footage looks really great too. Definitely recommend getting a few other lenses.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan C.

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Really great and light camera to carry around. Great for those who are beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Xai Xiong

customer_reviews.title: Mirrorless for portability.
customer_reviews.text: Just love it. It’s not perfect but it’s close! I like the m4/3 system for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best camera ever
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my son and you would not believe the beautiful pics he's taken with it. He says it's the best camera ever
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent picture quality
customer_reviews.text: For the price of the camera and for my first Panasonic I don’t have complaints it’s overall a wonderful camera and good by .
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Handy and quality
customer_reviews.text: High quality pictures in a compact package, very good for travels and street photography and for both amateur and advanced photographers
customer_reviews.author: josemtravesi

customer_reviews.title: Best quality, color and resolution on a budget
customer_reviews.text: This camera keeps amazing me every day. I’ve worked with high end models like RED and this little guy packs a punch for the price. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: 4K video is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Video is stunning! Focus capsule be better but isn't terrible. Packs a lot of features into one camera.
customer_reviews.author: Darin

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful pictures. Easy to handle. Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Can’t go wrong
customer_reviews.text: I use this camera for recording mostly and it’s great. Compact and easy to use. The extra lens is a legitimate steal in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: What is there not to like?! We are so so so excited!!! It's our first baby.
customer_reviews.author: Abby Love

customer_reviews.title: Unless you need 4K the Sony A6000 does way better in stills and is cheaper too
customer_reviews.text: Bought a used one off amazon warehouse. Body internals made a lot of noise. (maybe it was broken or dropped?) Could never get camera to focus, many shots were blurry on or off a tripod. Shot with the 25 f1.7 and if i'm lucky maybe 1/10 photos will be in focus. Unless you need 4K the Sony A6000 does way better in stills and is cheaper too.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera!!
customer_reviews.text: Photographer for 10 years+, bought this as a "back up" camera to carry around but fell in love with it right away. I find myself using it more and more. Wont replace a proper SLR, but mated with a 14-140mm makes a very good everyday / travel camera.
customer_reviews.author: Israel Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: the weight and feature rich makes it very good. Just bring extra batteries especially if you're doing ...
customer_reviews.text: just getting my way thru it. It just make it easier to take pictures while you travel, the size, the weight and feature rich makes it very good. Just bring extra batteries especially if you're doing a lot of video.
customer_reviews.author: bk

customer_reviews.title: great, especially with 20/1.7 lens; great value together
customer_reviews.text: Great camera for its price. Get the 20mm/f1.7 lens; it's cheap and one of the best lens. The combination is outstanding. It's not a pocket camera (too big); but it's small and light enough to be an excellent travel camera.
customer_reviews.author: public name

customer_reviews.title: Great camera BUT.........
customer_reviews.text: I'll make this review short and simple. Stills and 4K are pretty sweet! Only complain is that when recording videos, auto/continues focus sucks. Even when it's on auto/continues focus mode you will STILL have to do it manually. If not, you'll end up with out of focus videos.
customer_reviews.author: Khayyyeeeee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality of materials
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality of materials, photos and video spectacular, great possibilities of configuration and parameterization, very good wifi functionality and high performance of the battery. Totally recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Cristian

customer_reviews.title: A fine, pleasant-to-use camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a sweet little camera (fits in a jacket pocket) for street photography with its 12-32 mm kit zoom lens, very fast focus, and silent electronic shutter. I'm sure it will be good for landscapes, half-length portraits, and many other subjects, but I haven't gotten around to those yet. Of course, the M4/3 lens line is famous for breadth and quality, so interchangeable lenses will broaden the scope of applicability.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Bloomfield

customer_reviews.title: Great mirrorless camera, worth upgrade. Great Seller highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Great mirrorless camera. Great seller as well, camera was in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: Manvendra Kumar

customer_reviews.title: Lives up to all the specs and hype, just miss my GF6
customer_reviews.text: Everything I could have hoped for and more. The features and specs are amazing. The 5-axis stabilization is killer. I just miss the size of my GF6 and the screen that could flip 180 degrees. Oh, another feature that really stood out is that i can charge the battery while its in the camera (it makes it really easy to charge on the go)
customer_reviews.author: Luke Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Long on camera, short on accessories.
customer_reviews.text: The good news: this is a great camera. I own 3 Lumix's including the GH4 and every Lumix lens available, and this is definitely a step forward in image quality and features. The bad news: no external battery charger or HDMI mini cable? Come on. This is an expensive camera. I can live without an audio jack for an external mic, but skimping on accessories is cheap and insulting ... hence the removal of one star.
customer_reviews.author: Durt

customer_reviews.title: sssoooo close to perfection...
customer_reviews.text: Quite possibly the best, feature filled, relatively small travel camera ever made. The 'kit' zoom is physically small, but sacrifices focal length and lens speed to get there. BUT... the lenses are interchangeable with the world of Panasonic and Olympus micro-four-thirds optics for real pro-quality range of visual tools. (quite possibly the DUMBEST name for a camera format ever invented.) that it lacks weather-resistance is why I deprive it of its 5th star. That might have just made it perfect.
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: wish battery life were better.
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is quite short, otherwise this is a great travel camera with the kit lens. I use three batteries in a day of travel, 350-400 pictures that I pare down to about 50. Picture quality is OK with the kit lens but am considering a second lens for use when not traveling.
customer_reviews.author: NP

customer_reviews.title: Came packaged very well and securely. Unfortunately, this ...
customer_reviews.text: Came packaged very well and securely. Unfortunately, this camera was just far heavier than I expected; making it impractical for my desire to use for travel. I didn't spend much time with the camera itself before it was returned, but I can say that I was surprised to see additional presets such as a glimmer effect
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera. I just wish there was a manual explaining all the things it could do. You need to know something about photography to understand it.
customer_reviews.author: CBD

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera. Very compact and powerfull
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camera. Very compact and powerfull. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: WF

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Came in perfect condition, works wonderfully. I am very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: thus saving me form constant lens changes as I do not like using zoom lenses
customer_reviews.text: I knew the product before I bough this one, as I already own one of these cameras. I need 2 bodies, so that I can affix 2 prime lenses at different focal lengths each, thus saving me form constant lens changes as I do not like using zoom lenses. The re-seller sends me emails pretending they need to know if I have received the camera, but I think the real reason for their 'concern' is that they want me to post a review, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Eli

customer_reviews.title: Very good camera.
customer_reviews.text: Great camera with few weaknesses. Good image quality, 4K, small and compact. But it lacks enough manual controls for serious photography, it's plastic and the buttons are mushy.
customer_reviews.author: Dotyman

customer_reviews.title: Is Panasonic trying to confuse it's customers?
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely satisfied with the camera in every respect - features, image quality, ease of use and everything else. There is only one problem. I need another battery, which I ordered twice, with two different suppliers, one of them being Amazon. But Panasonic has a model called Panasonic DMC-G85 and the other Panasonic DMC-GX85, and both times I received batteries for the the DMC-G85 instead of the DMC-GX85. It looks like Panasonic is trying to confuse both its customers and its suppliers. Ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Pesic

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera. I have several Lumix cameras and love them.
customer_reviews.author: Gary O Gustman

product_meta.title: PANASONIC LUMIX GX85 Camera with 12-32mm Lens, 4K, 5 Axis Body Stabilization, 3 Inch Tilt and Touch Display, DMC-GX85KK (Black USA)
product_meta.description: Style:w/ 12-32mm (Black)For today's interchangeable lens camera enthusiasts — or anyone looking for a lighter, newer more intelligent alternative to bulky DSLRs — Panasonic LUMIX Mirrorless Micro Four Thirds system cameras deliver impressive, no-compromise performance. Nearly half the size of most DSLRs, the DMC-GX85 delivers impressive large sensor performance in the most compact camera system ever designed by Panasonic LUMIX. Thanks to the elimination of the low pass filter, its fine detail resolving power is boosted nearly 10% over previous 16-Megapixel sensors. Image stabilization is top of its class with the complementary LUMIX 2-axis lens O.I.S. and a new 5-axis in-body I.S., available in either photo or video recording modes. Camera purists will enjoy the familiar quick-access thumbwheel controls and integrated 2764k-dot eye-level electronic viewfinder, plus a tilting LCD display for greater flexibility in difficult shooting angles. Modern enthusiasts will love the WiFi mobile control and next-generation flexibility that 4K Video, 4K PHOTO and 4K Post Focus modes bring to the creative experience.
feature_bullets: New 5-axis in-body sensor stabilizer works with LUMIX 2-axis optically stabilized lenses in video and still capture modes using class-leading Dual Image Stabilization
Eliminates the need for low-pass sensor filters while boosting fine detail resolving power by nearly 10% over existing 16-Megapixel MFT sensors
Shoot lighter and faster with the modern hybrid photography performance of a Mirrorless camera and nearly half the bulk of most DSLRs
Thumbwheel controls, integrated viewfinder and touch control enabled tilting LCD maximize control of the photographic experience
Capture spontaneous moments with 4K imaging performance in both 4K video and exclusive 4K PHOTO and Post Focus. Dust reduction system: Supersonic wave filter

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars365 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
